title: Innovation platforms for improved livelihoods and rainwater management in Ethiopia

tasks.task: Organize and facilitate community engagement for natural resource management.
subtasks: Set up innovation platforms with stakeholders (communities, university, research centers, development agents, farmers).
Brief stakeholders on the objectives of innovation platforms.
Identify roles and terms of reference for stakeholders.
Facilitate focus group discussions and participatory videos for community input.
Prioritize key issues of natural resource management based on community and expert input.

tasks.task: Implement forage interventions to address identified issues.
subtasks: Plan forage planting activities with local communities.
Coordinate joint action among stakeholders for forage development.
Establish technical groups for monitoring activities between meetings.
Conduct awareness creation with small farmers.
Plan field days to demonstrate successful interventions.

tasks.task: Address challenges in behavioral change and capacity building.
subtasks: Address time constraints and limited impact within the project period.
Provide training for innovation platform members on facilitation skills and participatory methods.
Devolve roles and responsibilities to local partners for scaled implementation.
